Key Match Events: The Utah Jazz dropped the first game of 2024-25, falling at Delta Center to the Memphis Grizzlies 126-124.
Pre-Game Insights: The Jazz enter the season with a new look after finishing 12th in the Western Conference last season with a 31-51 record.
Despite inking Lauri Markkanen to a long-term max extension, few expect Utah to make a push for the playoffs in a loaded West.
